paragraph.heading: 2Handy Shortcuts and Tags
3Shortcuts
paragraph.paragraph: The following shortcuts are defined whilst in the editor:

row.cell: Paste clipboard at cursor or highlighted area
Tag text as bold ('a' becomes ' a')
Tag text as italic (a becomes ' a')

paragraph.heading: 3Quick tags
paragraph.paragraph:
To quickly input tags that are known to the editor through the loaded
../xml/index.xml schema definition just right-click in the text and the editor will display a drop down list of available tags based upon the cursor position.
If you right click over highlighted text and select a tag it will enclose the highlighted text in that tag.
paragraph.heading: 3Quick Urls
paragraph.paragraph: To quickly add a url link to a document within your project navigate to the file in the project tree, right-click, and drop the rubber band in the editor. A relative url to the dropped document will be inserted at the current cursor position.
